text: ninnalilarenkilum bharyamare vitteccu ‎mariccupeayal a bharyamar nal masavum pattu ‎divasavum tannale svayam niyantriccunirttenta ‎tan. annane avarute kalavadhiyettiyal ‎tannalute karyattil n'yayamaya nilayil avar ‎pravarttikkunnatil ninnalkk kurrameannumilla. ‎ninnal ceyyunnatellam suksmamayi ‎ariyunnavanan allahu. ‎
